answers.answer: You did not say with what she was diagnosed.  I am sorry you are afraid, but a little more info would be helpful!

oops sorry, thought this was the child health board.  I am sorry.  Having a child with diabetes is very hard, but manageable.  Fear stops us from dealing with the issues we need to deal with.  Become knowledgeable about diabetes and help her through knowledge and courage to help her face this.There are many things on the horizon that will help her.  She is young and much is being done to find better ways to control diabetes.

question: im very scare my grand baby were diagnose at age 4 now she will be 5 in a few days she is my hero cause she is very good in taking her shots but i want my baby to live. Live life like I have done no one in the family have this I just feel like cryingall the time for my sweet sweet grand baby.
title: She's my LIFE
